mapper.select: select b.id, b.btitle, b.bcontent, b.bfile, b.bip, b.bpass, b.bhit, b.bcreateDate, m.id as member_id, m.username as member_username from board b left join member m on b.member_id = m.id order by b.id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select b.id, b.btitle, b.bcontent, b.bfile, b.bip, b.bpass, b.bhit, b.bcreateDate, from board b order by b.createDate desc
select b.id, b.btitle, b.bcontent, b.bfile, b.bip, b.bpass, b.bhit, b.bcreateDate, from board b where b.id = #{id}
insert into board ( btitle, bcontent, bip, bfile, bpass, bhit, member_id ) values ( #{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bip}, #{bfile}, #{bpass}, #{bhit}, #{member.id} )
mapper.delete: delete from board where id=#{id} and bpass=#{bpass}
